parameter.value: I am responsible for this post office. If you have questions about the mail system or the depots, just ask me.
The mail system enables you to send and receive letters and parcels. You can buy them here if you want.
The depots are very easy to use. Just step in front of them and you will find your items in them. They are free for everyone to use.
You may send letters and parcels to this city.
Casteldine is like the other two cities located in Lithaton. You may send parcels and letters to this city. The only exception is of course Tha'Reen, which is located here on Dustwit.
Celeres is like the other two cities located in Lithaton. You may send parcels and letters to this city. The only exception is of course Tha'Reen, which is located here on Dustwit.
Adanac is like the other two cities located in Lithaton. You may send parcels and letters to this city. The only exception is of course Tha'Reen, which is located here on Dustwit.
Valid destinations for letters and parcels are Casteldine, Tha'Reen, Adanac and Celeres.
